content.rendered:
Position is part of a formal internship program in professional development in the contract management services industry. Supports business units and assists in projects. Builds skills and knowledge in large corporate and team environment.

The Graphic Artist is responsible for translating various brand designs into mechanical files and building precise and complete files, that are ready for email distribution or prepress/printing by utilizing a strong knowledge of layout, graphic design and print production.

Required Education, Skills and Experience:

  • Prefer 4 completed semesters of graphic design
  • Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite and fluent in MS Office, Word, and PPT- Preferred
  • Experience in image manipulation and color correction
  • Ability to work within a fast-paced development cycle
  • Ability to apply and enforce style/brand guidelines
  • Detail oriented with excellent organizational/communication skills
